marklogic.body:
Â Thanks Darryl for your post.Â The instinctive thing to do is jump on the "he just murdered someone in Cold blood" band wagon.Â
And you're right about the pic I've heard it was from when he was 12 years old.Â
When the media reported that a "white" man that looks 100% Hispanic shot a young black man I knew what they were trying to do.Â Start a riot.
Unfortunately in the black community if you dare jump the "group think"... "group vote"... ship you're made a pariah.
I have a lot of black friends that are conservative and a lot of them are afraid to even say how they really feel and think.Â This is truly fascistic.
I've often said for democrats to get 96% of any demographic's vote is frightening.Â Saddam Hussein only used to get 98% of the vote and he used to kill people that voted against him!
I just keep praying blacks will wake up and smell the rose's Allen West has been sniffing... and get Off the democrats plantation just like he did.
